page.title: 17Entertainment in Much Marcle
page.content: There are two main events in Much Marcle. The first is the traction Rally which is held in fields at the centre of the village during the last weekend in July. There are many vintage steam engines,lorries and motor bikes on display. There is also a fair with dodgems,big wheel and waltzers.The best thing is a huge crane that lifts you into the air so you can see all over the village. People come from all over the country to this avent.The second event is the Flower show in August. Anyone can take part in the flower and vegetable competitions and all the villagers enjoy themselves. There is a flower tent, a beer tent,five a side football, trade stands and grass track racing. All the local People come to this show.
